common.copyright: Â© 2022 Ubiik Inc. All rights reserved
common.passwordRule: Password must be at least six characters long, and include 3 out of 4 of the following: uppercase letter, lowercase letter, numeric character and special character.

error.emailFormat: Email is incorrect, please try again.
error.emailNotExist: Account does not exist, please try again.
error.passwordFormat: Password must meet complexity requirements, please try again.
error.passwordIncorrect: Password is incorrect, please try again.
error.passwordNotMatch: Password does not match, please try again.

forgotPassword.sentResetLink: We've just sent password reset link to {email}. Please check your inbox and spam folders.

resetPassword.loginWithNewPassword: Please log in with your new password.
